alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:12PM EDT until April 15 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York... Northwestern Delaware County in central New York... Southeastern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sidney, or 15 miles south of Norwich, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail and winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Guilford, Coventry, Bainbridge, Unadilla, Afton, Brisben, Mt Upton, South Oxford and Rockdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
